title: Community solar power player Perch swallows up Mitsui’s Solstice
description: Perch Energy has acquired Solstice, enhancing its community solar management in the United States, where it serves more than 430,000 customers across 16 states.
content: Perch Energy has acquired Solstice, enhancing its community solar management in the United States, where it serves more than 430,000 customers across 16 states.
